mapper.select: select msg_id, content_type, content, status, route_key, exchange, count, try_time, create_time, update_time from subtlechat.mail_send_log where msg_id = #{msgId}
select msg_id, content_type, content, status, route_key, exchange, count, try_time, create_time, update_time from subtlechat.mail_send_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into subtlechat.mail_send_log(msg_id,content_type, content, status, route_key, exchange, count, try_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{msgId},#{contentType}, #{content}, #{status}, #{routeKey}, #{exchange}, #{count}, #{tryTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:

content_type = #{contentType},
content = #{content},
status = #{status},
route_key = #{routeKey},
exchange = #{exchange},
count = #{count},
try_time = #{tryTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},

mapper.select: select * from subtlechat.mail_send_log where status=#{delivering} and try_time <sysdate()
